CN.content:

Paragraph: Especially , the device based on a ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM of 1 : 3 ( w / w ) in TCB solutions exhibited the maximum EQE of 72% at 479 nm.

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM
3. TCB
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Especially , the device based on a ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM of 1 : 3 ( w / w ) in TCB solutions exhibited the maximum EQE of 72% at 479 nm.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! The "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. EQE (External Quantum Efficiency)
2. PSFDTBT (Poly[4,8-bis(2-ethylhexyl)benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']dithiophene-2,6-diyl]bis(2-methylphenyl)-1,4-phenylene)
3. PC71BM (Poly[cyclopentadienylene(1-ethyl-1,2-dimethylpropyl)benzene]-1,4-phenylene)
4. TCB (Ternary Compound Blend)

These are the names of the materials or properties that are being discussed in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. EQE (External Quantum Efficiency)
2. PSFDTBT (Poly[4,8-bis(2-ethylhexyl)benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']dithiophene-2,6-diyl]bis(2-methylphenyl)-1,4-phenylene)
3. PC71BM (Poly[cyclopentadienylene(1-ethyl-1,2-dimethylpropyl)benzene]-1,4-phenylene)

These are the material properties that are being discussed in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| EQE |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Especially , the device based on a ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM of 1 : 3 ( w / w ) in TCB solutions exhibited the maximum EQE of 72% at 479 nm.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 72% - the maximum EQE (External Quantum Efficiency)
2. 479 nm - the wavelength at which the maximum EQE was observed
3. 1 : 3 (w/w) - the ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM in the TCB solutions.

These are the specific values of physical properties that are mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

1. 72% - the maximum EQE (External Quantum Efficiency)
2. 479 nm - the wavelength at which the maximum EQE was observed

The ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM in the TCB solutions (1 : 3 (w/w)) is not a direct measurement of a material property, but rather a composition ratio of two materials. Therefore, it is not considered a Property Value entity in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 72% |
| 479 nm |
